datetime_format_check.failure: `{}` does not adhere to the ISO 1601 standard.
datetime_format_check.remediation: Ensure that the datetime complies with the ISO 1601 standard.

date_or_datetime_format_check.failure: `{}` does not adhere to the ISO 1601 standard for date or datetime.
date_or_datetime_format_check.remediation: Ensure that the date or datetime complies with the ISO 1601 standard.

data_update_time_logic_check.failure: The Update/Revision date `{}` comes before the provided Insert/Creation time `{}`.
data_update_time_logic_check.remediation: Recommend updating the Update/Revision date so that it is identical to the Insert/Creation time (in the event that the data/metadata has never been updated) or so that it comes chronologically after the Insert/Creation time.

data_revision_date_logic_check.failure: The Revision date `{}` comes before the provided Insert/Creation time `{}`.
data_revision_date_logic_check.remediation: Recommend updating the Revision date so that it comes chronologically after the Insert/Creation time.

shortname_uniqueness.failure: The EntryTitle/DataSetId `{}` is identical to the ShortName `{}`.
shortname_uniqueness.remediation: The EntryTitle/DataSetId should not be identical to the ShortName. Recommend providing a descriptive, formal title for the dataset.

abstract_length_check.failure: The abstract provided may be inadequate based on length.
abstract_length_check.remediation: Recommend providing a more comprehensive description, mimicking a journal abstract that is useful to the science community but also approachable for a first time user of the data.

doi_validity_check.remediation: Provide a valid DOI. Make sure the field contains only the DOI string (eg. 10.1109/5.771073), not the DOI URL.

doi_missing_reason_presence_check.remediation: DOIs are required for NASA datasets. Provide the DOI if one is available. Otherwise, specify that a DOI is not applicable for the dataset by populating the 'MissingReason' metadata element.

doi_missing_reason_enumeration_check.remediation: MissingReason is controlled by an enumeration and should read "Not Applicable".

processing_level_id_check.failure: `{}` is not an EOSDIS recognized Processing Level Id.
processing_level_id_check.remediation: Recommend changing the Id to match one of the EOSDIS Data Processing Levels, if applicable: [0, 1A, 1B, 1C, 2, 2A, 2B, 3, 3A, 4]

processing_level_description_length_chec.failure: The provided description is less than 50 characters and therefore may be lacking in contextual information.

help.message: Use the EOSDIS Data Processing Level descriptions as guidance.

processing_level_description_length_chec.remediation: Consider providing a more detailed processing level description.

science_keywords_gcmd_check.failure: `{}` is not a valid GCMD science keyword.
science_keywords_gcmd_check.remediation: Provide a valid GCMD keyword or submit a request to support@earthdata.nasa.gov to have this keyword added to the GCMD KMS.

location_gcmd_check.failure: `{}` is not a valid GCMD location keyword.
location_gcmd_check.remediation: Provide a valid GCMD keyword or submit a request to support@earthdata.nasa.gov to have this keyword added to the GCMD KMS.

eosdis_doi_authority_check.remediation: The DOI Authority should be "https://doi.org" for all NASA collections.

delete_time_check.failure: The delete date `{}` is in the past.

organization_short_name_gcmd_check.failure: The provided data center short name `{}` does not comply with GCMD.

collection_data_type_enumeration_check.remediation: The Collection Data Type should match one of the following values: [NEAR_REAL_TIME, LOW_LATENCY, EXPEDITED, SCIENCE_QUALITY, OTHER]

version_description_not_provided.remediation: Because the description reads "Not provided", it can be removed from the metadata. Otherwise, please describe the version in more detail.

ends_at_present_flag_logic_check.failure:
Potential issue with:
 - EndsAtPresentFlag: value = "true" but EndingDateTime is provided. 
 - EndsAtPresentFlag: value = "true" but CollectionState is not "ACTIVE". 
 - EndsAtPresentFlag: value = "false" but EndingDateTime is missing.
 - EndsAtPresentFlag: value = "false" but CollectionState is not "COMPLETE".
ends_at_present_flag_logic_check.remediation: If data collection is ongoing, provide an EndsAtPresentFlag of "true"

ends_at_present_flag_presence_check.failure:
Potential issue with:
 - No EndingDateTime provided; no EndsAtPresentFlag provided for a potentially active collection. 
 - CollectionState is not "COMPLETE"; no EndsAtPresentFlag provided for a potentially active collection.
ends_at_present_flag_presence_check.remediation: If data collection is ongoing, provide an EndsAtPresentFlag of "true"

online_resource_description_uniqueness_c.remediation: Descriptions should be unique to each URL. At least one of the descriptions are repeated in this record. Recommend changing the descriptions to more accurately and uniquely describe each link.

online_access_description_uniqueness_che.remediation: Descriptions should be unique to each URL. At least one of the descriptions are repeated in this record. Recommend changing the descriptions to more accurately and uniquely describe each link.

metadata_update_time_logic_check.failure: Note: the 'UPDATE' Metadata Date is chronologically before the 'CREATE' Metadata Date.
metadata_update_time_logic_check.remediation: Recommend modifying the 'UPDATE' Metadata Date so that it is identical to or chronologically after the 'CREATE' Metadata Date.

periodic_duration_unit_check.failure: The provided Periodic Duration Unit `{}` does not align with the controlled vocabulary.
periodic_duration_unit_check.remediation: Recommend providing a Periodic Duration Unit from the following list: ['DAY', 'MONTH', 'YEAR'].

granule_single_date_time_check.failure: The Beginning Date Time and the Ending Date Time are identical.
granule_single_date_time_check.remediation: Recommend providing a Single Date Time instead of a Range Date Time.

granule_project_short_name_check.failure: The campaign/project short name `{}` listed in the granule metadata does not match the campaign/project short name listed in the collection metadata.
granule_project_short_name_check.remediation: Recommend providing the same campaign/project short name in the collection and granule metadata.

granule_sensor_short_name_check.failure: The sensor short name `{}` listed in the granule metadata does not match the sensor short name listed in the collection metadata.
granule_sensor_short_name_check.remediation: Recommend providing the same sensor short name in the collection and granule metadata.

validate_granule_data_format_against_col.failure: The data format listed in the granule metadata does not match the data format listed in the collection metadata
validate_granule_data_format_against_col.remediation: Recommend providing the same data format in the collection and granule metadata, if appropriate.

granule_data_format_presence_check.failure: The granule data format is missing.
granule_data_format_presence_check.remediation: Recommend providing the associated data format from the following list: https://gcmd.earthdata.nasa.gov/kms/concepts/concept_scheme/GranuleDataFormat/?format=csv.

sensor_number_check.failure: The Number Of Instruments/Sensors value `{}` does not match the number of instruments/sensors provided `{}`.
sensor_number_check.remediation: Recommend updating the Number Of Instruments/Sensors value to match the numerical amount of instruments/sensors provided.

horizontal_resolution_presence_check.failure: No horizontal resolution information is provided.
horizontal_resolution_presence_check.remediation: Recommend providing the horizontal pixel resolution, if applicable. If provided, this information will be indexed in the EDSC 'Horizontal Data Resolution' search facet which allows users to search by spatial resolution.
